text: to qaarun kahane laga ki ye (maal va daulat) to mujhe apane ilm (keemiya) kee vajah se haasil hota hai kya qaarun ne ye bhee na khyaal kiya ki allaah usake pahale un logon ko halaaq kar chuka hai jo usase qoovat aur haisiyat mein kaheen badh badh ke the aur gunaahagaaron se (unakee saza ke vakt) unake gunaahon kee poochhataachh nahin hua karatee
